mapper.select: SELECT h.log_no AS logNo, DATE_FORMAT(h.log_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS logDate, h.log_contents AS logContents, h.project_project_no AS projectNo, p.project_title AS projectTitle FROM history AS h JOIN project AS p ON h.project_project_no = p.project_no WHERE h.project_project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER by h.log_no desc;
SELECT log_no AS logNo, log_date AS logDate, log_contents AS logContents, project_project_no AS projectNo FROM history WHERE project_project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER by log_no desc;
